```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(here)
```

```{r get-data}

# files
files_to_read <- list.files(here("data"))
df_names <- map_chr(files_to_read, .f = function(x) {stringr::str_remove(x, ".csv")})

# read in files
data_files <- map(files_to_read, .f = function(x) read_csv(here("data", x))) %>% 
  set_names(df_names)
```
